video_title: How I use Reddit and AI to find winning startup ideas

content_profile.title: How I use Reddit and AI to find winning startup ideas

key_takeaways: Solution: Use Reddit analysis to identify pain points and trending communities (Difficulty: beginner)
Growth Tactic: Use Reddit research to create content people will love (Channel: content)
AI Workflow: Reddit Market Research and Idea Validation
Strategy: Multiple business model opportunities from single market research
Strategy: Focus on 10,000-100,000 member subreddits for startup opportunities

startup_ideas.title: Dog potty training service or content business
startup_ideas.target_market: Dog owners with new or rehomed pets
startup_ideas.business_model: Service business, content creation, or digital products
startup_ideas.validation: Identified through Reddit pain point analysis
startup_ideas.estimated_investment: Low - can start as side business

startup_ideas.title: Gummy Search competitor
startup_ideas.problem_solved: High cost of existing Reddit analysis tools

market_gaps.title: Finding validated startup ideas without direct customer interviews
market_gaps.solution_approach: Use Reddit analysis to identify pain points and trending communities

trend_opportunities.title: Growing communities in 10K-100K range represent emerging opportunities
trend_opportunities.opportunity: Less competition but validated demand in trending niches

comment_derived_trends.trend: Strong preference for actionable, step-by-step business content
comment_derived_trends.business_implication: Market opportunity for tactical business education over theoretical content

comment_derived_trends.trend: Demand for affordable business research tools
supporting_comments: don't charge freaking 60 bucks a month
comment_derived_trends.business_implication: Opportunity to build lower-cost alternatives to existing SaaS tools

practical_next_steps: Validate one of the startup ideas with target market interviews
Set up one AI workflow to automate a business process
Review mistakes to avoid and create prevention checklist
